nodes.message: Flirt with Joel in RCC or Rec Room

nodes.text: You look dapper today.
Why, thank you. I pride myself upon making a good impression with people.
I like your tie. It looks silky against your skin.
Ah, it is, indeed, made from silk. That is very discerning of you.
For someone who hangs out with lowlifes in alleyways, you certainly dress well.
I do not want people to think badly of me. Besides, when I do dress for the streets, people do not recognize me.
What's a nice kid like you doing in a place like this?
I am hoping that a nice kid like you will want something that I have.
Oh, I do.
When you aren't hanging around Sosi, you are a much nicer person.
<shrug> Caesari likes to be in charge, so I tend to follow his lead.
You should get away from Sosi more often then.
You are the friendliest person at this school.
I try very hard to be likable. I do not wish to make enemies of anyone.
It's always a pleasure to see your smiling face.
Mr. O'Conner, it is such a pleasure to speak with you that I cannot help but smile.
Call me Shawn. We're friends, after all.
If there was an award for 'Best Dressed Rogue of the Year,' you'd certainly win it.
Thank you, I take great pride in my appearance.
There's something different about you today...
You look more confident and self-assured.
Really? I don't generally assert myself. I tend to be a shadow rather than a light.
Nice jacket you have on - makes you look sophisticated.
This? it is just my regular jacket, nothing special.
It looks special on you.
Master von Urwald seems very favorably impressed by you.
You think so? I have always found the Master severe. I would not want to incur his ire.
You should call this the 'Joel's Store with More' to make me poor. You certainly know how to get me to spend my hard earned Lyra.
I try very hard to find items that will be useful to you and other Disbarred Bards.
It always makes my day better when I get the chance to talk to you.
It isn't just that I am useful to you that you speak with me?
Joel, we're friends, right? I like you.
You look so serious today. You should smile more often.
There has been a lot on my mind lately.
However, I am happy to speak with you.
Your blue eyes sparkle in the torchlight.
Perhaps they sparkle because you are near me.
Is it warm in here suddenly, or is it just because I'm near you?
Do you imply that I am full of hot air?
No, it's just the warmth of your smile that heats up the room.
When you smile, this whole castle lights up.
When you smile, Shawn, you make everyone around you smile.
Excluding Caesari, of course.
You look particularly handsome and dashing today.
What an amazing coincidence! I was going to say much the same about you.
Why, if it isn't the man of my dreams.
Are you certain they are dreams rather than nightmares?
What would you say if I asked you to go on a date with me sometime?
Why don't you ask me and then you'll find out?
Your lips look lonely - would they like to meet mine?
I believe they could use a proper introduction, yes.
Your eyes are like the sea - wild, enticing, and very dangerous.
My eyes are dangerous? How so?
Because I could drown myself in them.
You really are a master thief - you stole my heart when I wasn't looking.
Then it would only be fair of me to give you my heart in return.
Are you as cuddly as you are cute?
I am wondering if you are as cuddly as you are clever. We shall have to find out sometime, won't we?
If I tell you that you have a beautiful body, will you hold it against me?
Let me think about it for a moment... No.
I can't think of anything else I'd rather do than that.
Why don't we put our Disbarred Bards skills to good use by sneaking off for a while together?
How very roguish of you to suggest such a thing! I know the perfect place for us...
We should do this more often.
As often as possible...
Shall we slip away for a little S and C?
S and C - what is that?
Snuggling and Cuddling - and everything else that goes with that.
Will there be kissing?
I think we can work that part into our busy schedule, too.
Then by all means, lead me into temptation.
We'll have to practice this again sometime.
Practice makes perfect, after all.
Care to go for a little stroll around the dungeon with me?
I think that I can find the time in my most busy of schedules to do a little exploring with you now.
Who knew that dungeons could be so romantic?
Dungeons are not romantic. It is what we do in the dungeons that is romantic.
You make me feel like a hero when I'm around you.
That's because you are a hero - and I shall always be happy to remind you of that fact.
I shall also be very pleased to properly reward you for being my hero. Shall we?
<grin>
Mind if I drag you away from your work for a little rest and relaxation?
I will be most grateful to go off with you, although I am not too sure about the relaxation part of your proposal. I find you much too exciting to relax around you.
When I'm away from you, I can't stop thinking about you.
There is an easy enough solution to that problem...
We obviously need to spend more time together so that you don't have to think.

nodes.message: Use cycle for text so visuals are consistent.

nodes.text: Wow, who knew that heroism could be so rewarding?
Isn't it obvious that I find you exciting too?
Oh yes, I can tell.
Of course, now I'll be spending the rest of my time thinking about being with you. You are highly addictive, my friend.
